snippet.title: Playing Savage Worlds: Exploding Dice
snippet.description:
Taking a break from videogames to talk about tabletop games, Savage Worlds in particular. I thought this'd be a relatively easy review to make, not really. I double checked things as I was writing but if I got ANYTHING wrong please point it out in the comments (with timestamp) so I can annotate that shit

Music from:
- Mount and Blade
- Medieval 2: Total War
- Civilisation V
- Fable
- Guns of Icarus
 and Rossini's William Tell Overture
